roleset.name: To catch up, come even with

role.descr: Goal, thing arg1 is trying to catch up to

example.name: To ketchup or not to ketchup?
example.text: Public preference is important , So product names should match up , And firms that find they 're lagging behind Should now take steps whnp-2 *T*-2 to ketchup !
example.note: I have a sneaking suspicion this is just a terrible tree...

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire. Comparison to catch.04 (catch up).
